titles.title: SAFE Laboratories Act
SAFE Laboratories Act
Stop Adversarial Funding Expenditures for Laboratories Act
To prohibit any head of a Federal agency from providing assistance to the Wuhan Institute of Virology and other laboratories in certain other foreign nations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
Stop Adversarial Funding Expenditures for Laboratories Act or the SAFE Laboratories Act
This bill prohibits federal assistance to the Wuhan Institute of Virology or any other laboratory located in a country determined to be a foreign adversary, including China, Russia, North Korea, and Iran.
